alert.note: Alert for Mitchell (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Mitchell and northwestern Colquitt Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Pelham to 9 miles east of Camilla. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pelham, Camilla, Doerun, Sale City, Laney, Mitchell Co A/P, Poplar Arbor Church, Hartsfield, Minnesota, Hinsonton and Cotton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
